description: unique sample id for each sample
unique species id for each species
The weight of the leaves which were used in measuring the leaf area, the leaves are collected separately in small ziplog bag from the field
Determined in Li-coR Leaf Area Meter(Model 3100 Area Meter), The number of leaf was not specified
Measured after 48 hours of oven drying at 65 degree celsius temperature
Percentage of above ground dead material, estimated visually
